data.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: The truth is incontrovertible. Malice may attack it, ignorance may deride it, but in the end, there it is.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
data.author: Winston Churchill
